item.title: Blossoms from the Dust: A model for salvation
item.description: Blossoms from the Dust: A model for salvation A close reading of Rainer Maria Rilke’s poem Dich wundert nicht des Sturmes Wucht (You are not surprised at the force of the storm).

item.title: My Bachelor Thesis: Contradiction & Dichotomy
item.description: My Bachelor Thesis The results of my toils in college: Contradiction & Dichotomy: David Bergelson and Itzik Manger Confront the Bible, an eighty-six page exploration of the badass poetry of Itzik Manger and a fascinating story by David Bergelson.

item.title: My Mother's Challah Recipe
item.description: Challah (3 loaves) Ingredients 1 Tbs yeast 1.5 C warm water

item.title: Wisdom Teeth: Chuck 'Em?
item.description: So I’m getting my wisdom teeth out this week. The hygenist and two oral surgeons recommended I get them out, but you know what?

item.title: Warring over Yiddish Poetry: Retranslating Morris Rosenfeld as a Political Zionist
item.description: My second independent project in college: analyzing how the German translation of Morris Rosenfeld’s Yiddish sweatshop poetry changd it from a messianic work into political zionist poems.
